properties.name: Manila - Hong Kong Shipping Lane
properties.description: Major WWII shipping route between Manila and Hong Kong. Heavily used by Japanese convoys.
properties.historical_note: Primary target area for US submarine patrols

properties.name: Singapore - Manila Shipping Lane
properties.description: Critical supply route from Singapore through South China Sea to Manila. Japanese convoy route.
properties.historical_note: Vital Japanese supply line, heavily patrolled by Allied submarines 1942-1945

properties.name: Formosa (Taiwan) - Luzon Route
properties.description: Coastal route along eastern side of South China Sea. Connected Taiwan to Philippines.

properties.name: Indochina - Singapore Lane
properties.description: Coastal shipping between French Indochina (Vietnam) and Singapore.
properties.historical_note: Used for resource transport from Indochina to Japanese-held territories

properties.name: Cam Ranh Bay - Manila Route
properties.description: Direct route from major Japanese naval base at Cam Ranh Bay to Manila.
properties.historical_note: Cam Ranh Bay was major Japanese fleet anchorage. Prime hunting ground for submarines.
